amendment.description: Amendment terminates the HUD program for doctoral dissertation research grants on housing and urban development issues.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part A of House Report 111-578 to terminate the HUD program for doctoral dissertation research grants on housing and urban development issues.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boehner amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Boehner amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Boehner.
